Package org.fluentjava.closures

Package with closure utilities.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Closure Approximation of the concept of closure on Java.
ClosureCoercion Converts Objects do Closures, or throws ClosureCoercionException if can't.
ClosureOfAMethod Wraps around an object instance and a method of its class.
ClosureOfAString Wraps around a public method name.
InvocationHandlerAdapter Adaptas a closure to a Invocation Handler.
Predicate A predicate is a closure that always returns a boolean (primitive).
PredicateAdapter Adaptas a closure to a predicate.
 

Exception Summary
ClosureCoercionException Indicates an Object could not be converted to a Closure.
 

Package org.fluentjava.closures Description

Package with closure utilities.
